body_html:
This GitHub issue was created for 12 test failures , now all got resolved for me. Please find the details below (currently I am working on TF1.3.1 ):

1 //tensorflow/compiler/tests:binary_ops_test_cpu

This test was failing with the error : nan vs expected inf.
I ran sample code using inputs equivalent to ones used in the test case and using tensorflow "realdiv" API :

	>>> import tensorflow as tf
	>>> import numpy as np
	>>> sess = tf.Session()
	>>> dtype = np.float32
	>>> a =  np.array([3, 3, -1.5, -8, 44], dtype=dtype)
	>>> b = np.array([2, -2, 7, -4, 0], dtype=dtype)
	>>> pb = tf.placeholder(b.dtype, b.shape, name="b")
	>>> pa = tf.placeholder(a.dtype, a.shape, name="a")
	>>> output = tf.realdiv(pa, pb)
	>>> result = sess.run(output, {pa: a, pb: b})
	>>> print(result)
	[ 1.5        -1.5        -0.21428572    2.     inf]

This is printing results as expected by the test case.

2 //tensorflow/contrib/image:image_ops_test

This test was failing on RHEL7.3 vm. Now this machine upgraded to RHEL7.4.
I reran "image_ops_test" test on new OS and test passed successfully without any changes.

3 //tensorflow/tools/test:cast_op_benchmark
4 //tensorflow/tools/test:rnn_op_benchmark

Submitted code changes to fix these 2 tests.
Relevant commit : 69ba4d3

( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )

5 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:sparse_matmul_op_test
6 //tensorflow/core/kernels:sparse_matmul_op_test_gpu

These 2 tests fixed in PR #12138

( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )

7 //tensorflow/compiler/tests:pooling_ops_test_cpu
8 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:linalg_grad_test
9 //tensorflow/compiler/tests:ternary_ops_test_cpu

These 3 tests are passing in TF1.3.1 (without any changes).

10 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test test fixed in PR #15147

( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )

11 //tensorflow/core:platform_profile_utils_cpu_utils_test
12 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:cast_op_test

These 2 tests fixed in PR #10522
( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )

Thanks !!!
body_text:
This GitHub issue was created for 12 test failures , now all got resolved for me. Please find the details below (currently I am working on TF1.3.1 ):
1     //tensorflow/compiler/tests:binary_ops_test_cpu
This test was failing with the error : nan vs expected inf.
I ran sample code using inputs equivalent to ones used in the test case and using tensorflow "realdiv" API :
	>>> import tensorflow as tf
	>>> import numpy as np
	>>> sess = tf.Session()
	>>> dtype = np.float32
	>>> a =  np.array([3, 3, -1.5, -8, 44], dtype=dtype)
	>>> b = np.array([2, -2, 7, -4, 0], dtype=dtype)
	>>> pb = tf.placeholder(b.dtype, b.shape, name="b")
	>>> pa = tf.placeholder(a.dtype, a.shape, name="a")
	>>> output = tf.realdiv(pa, pb)
	>>> result = sess.run(output, {pa: a, pb: b})
	>>> print(result)
	[ 1.5        -1.5        -0.21428572    2.     inf]
	

This is printing results as expected by the test case.
2   //tensorflow/contrib/image:image_ops_test
This test was failing on RHEL7.3 vm. Now this machine upgraded to RHEL7.4.
I reran "image_ops_test"  test on new OS and test passed successfully without any changes.
3	//tensorflow/tools/test:cast_op_benchmark
4	//tensorflow/tools/test:rnn_op_benchmark
Submitted code changes to fix these 2 tests.
Relevant commit : 69ba4d3
( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )
5      //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:sparse_matmul_op_test
6	//tensorflow/core/kernels:sparse_matmul_op_test_gpu
These 2 tests fixed in PR #12138
( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )
7	//tensorflow/compiler/tests:pooling_ops_test_cpu
8	//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:linalg_grad_test
9	//tensorflow/compiler/tests:ternary_ops_test_cpu
These 3 tests are passing in TF1.3.1 (without any changes).
10 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test test fixed in PR #15147
( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )
11	//tensorflow/core:platform_profile_utils_cpu_utils_test
12	//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:cast_op_test
These 2 tests fixed in PR  #10522
( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )
Thanks !!!
body:
This GitHub issue was created for 12 test failures , now all got resolved for me. Please find the details below (currently I am working on TF1.3.1 ):

**1     //tensorflow/compiler/tests:binary_ops_test_cpu** 

This test was failing with the error : `nan vs expected inf.`
I ran sample code using inputs equivalent to ones used in the test case and using tensorflow "realdiv" API :
	
```
	>>> import tensorflow as tf
	>>> import numpy as np
	>>> sess = tf.Session()
	>>> dtype = np.float32
	>>> a =  np.array([3, 3, -1.5, -8, 44], dtype=dtype)
	>>> b = np.array([2, -2, 7, -4, 0], dtype=dtype)
	>>> pb = tf.placeholder(b.dtype, b.shape, name="b")
	>>> pa = tf.placeholder(a.dtype, a.shape, name="a")
	>>> output = tf.realdiv(pa, pb)
	>>> result = sess.run(output, {pa: a, pb: b})
	>>> print(result)
	[ 1.5        -1.5        -0.21428572    2.     inf]
	
```

This is printing results as expected by the test case.

**2   //tensorflow/contrib/image:image_ops_test**

This test was failing on RHEL7.3 vm. Now this machine upgraded to RHEL7.4.
I reran "image_ops_test"  test on new OS and test passed successfully without any changes.

**3	//tensorflow/tools/test:cast_op_benchmark
4	//tensorflow/tools/test:rnn_op_benchmark**

Submitted code changes to fix these 2 tests.
Relevant commit : https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/69ba4d3d49bd5775131ae7f00830a41f478dbbf5

( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )

**5      //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:sparse_matmul_op_test
6	//tensorflow/core/kernels:sparse_matmul_op_test_gpu**

These 2 tests fixed in PR https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/12138


( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )

**7	//tensorflow/compiler/tests:pooling_ops_test_cpu
8	//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:linalg_grad_test
9	//tensorflow/compiler/tests:ternary_ops_test_cpu**

These 3 tests are passing in TF1.3.1 (without any changes).

**10 //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:summary_image_op_test test fixed in PR** https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15147

( Note - Changes are not available in TF1.3.1 )

**11	//tensorflow/core:platform_profile_utils_cpu_utils_test
12	//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:cast_op_test**

These 2 tests fixed in PR  https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/10522
( Note - Changes are available in TF1.3.1 )

Thanks !!!
